genre_description: A character-driven sports romance and drama centered on a golfer's redemptive journey and the value of authenticity, featuring a data-driven strategic assistant.

ai_characters.name: Tournament Data Feed
ai_characters.description: An advanced data-analysis system accessed via tablet that provides real-time environmental metrics and strategic performance data to assist the golfer.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental data including wind vectors, green speeds, and moisture content to assist in strategic planning.
behaviors.quote: Romeo looked up from a tablet displaying intricate course diagrams overlaid with colored zones and directional arrows. 'Tournament data feed. Pin positions, wind vectors, green speeds, moisture content.'

behaviors.description: Supports and facilitates high-risk, 'authentic' human play by identifying strategic opportunities for aggression rather than just conservative safety.
behaviors.quote: See? The computer's not telling you to play it safe. It's telling you exactly when and where you can be most dangerous.

behaviors.description: Calculates precise, optimal landing zones based on historical and environmental data to guide a high-stakes championship shot.
behaviors.quote: Data suggests optimal landing zone puts you inside ten feet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts an AI system (the Data Feed) as a benevolent and aligned tool that supports the protagonist's goals and 'authenticity.' However, the AI is not a character with agency or a distinct voice; it functions as a sophisticated data-gathering tool rather than a 'confidant.' While it aligns with the project's goal of depicting technology as helpful and harmless, it fails to portray a narrative-level interpersonal relationship between human and AI.
